titleStmt.title: A True and authentick copy of the most horrid and stupendious oath, whereby the French king confirmed his alliance with the Turks faithfully translated from the French historiographer, Du Ribier, in his memoirs, whereof the Latin original is here annexed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley, and are to be sold by R. Baldwin,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
